channel.title: floss on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in floss on Will Schenk

item.title: Beginning Emacs
item.description: Intro I've been dipping back ito the world of free software, and have been having a huge amount of fun getting back into emacs. I'm using it more of an operating system than I ever did before, as a way to navigate the world using a text interface. I'd never thought I'd be done with the terminal, but this is the first time that I've got something better and more powerful.
